workshoptitle: Import PeopleSoft Environment Hosted On OCI Into PeopleSoft Cloud Manager

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Explanation of the Workshop and Goals

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: PeopleSoft Environment Details
tutorials.description: In this lab, PeopleSoft environments details are explained

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Import PeopleSoft Environment Into PeopleSoft Cloud Manager
tutorials.description: In this lab, you will import PeopleSoft Environment into PeopleSoft Cloud Manager

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Review Imported PeopleSoft Environment
tutorials.description: In this lab, you will review the imported PeopleSoft Environment and refresh OCI metadata

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
